Description: Out (Thumb) - The Magic listed Castleton as Out on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game versus the Nuggets.
Day To Day (Shoulder) - The Magic listed da Silva as Questionable on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game versus the Nuggets.
Out (Hip) - Suggs was diagnosed with a left hip contusion following an MRI on Monday (Dec. 15), as per Ohm Youngmisuk of ESPN.com reports.
Out (Leg) - Wagner was diagnosed with a high left ankle sprain Monday (Dec. 8) and could miss two-to-four weeks, as per ESPN's Shams Charania.
Out (Knee) - HC Mosley said that Wagner won't be available during Orlando's upcoming four-game road trip, according to Jason Beede of the Orlando Sentinel.
